verses.verse: Now there <S%H6817>cried<s%> a <S%H259>certain<s%> <S%H802>woman<s%> of the <S%H4480>wives<s%> <S%H802><s%> of the <S%H1121>sons<s%> of the <S%H5030>prophets<s%> <S%H413>unto<s%> <S%H477>Elisha,<s%> <S%H559>saying,<s%> Thy <S%H5650>servant<s%> my <S%H376>husband<s%> is <S%H4191>dead;<s%> and <S%H859>thou<s%> <S%H3045>knowest<s%> <S%H3588>that<s%> thy <S%H5650>servant<s%> <S%H1961>did<s%> <S%H3372>fear<s%> <S%H853><s%> the <S%H3068>LORD:<s%> and the <S%H5383>creditor<s%> is <S%H935>come<s%> to <S%H3947>take<s%> unto <S%H853>him<s%> my <S%H8147>two<s%> <S%H3206>sons<s%> to be <S%H5650>bondmen.<s%>

And <S%H477>Elisha<s%> <S%H559>said<s%> <S%H413>unto<s%> her, <S%H4100>What<s%> shall I <S%H6213>do<s%> for thee? <S%H5046>tell<s%> me, <S%H4100>what<s%> <S%H3426>hast<s%> thou in the <S%H1004>house?<s%> And she <S%H559>said,<s%> Thine <S%H8198>handmaid<s%> hath <S%H369>not<s%> any <S%H3605>thing<s%> in the <S%H1004>house,<s%> <S%H3588>save<s%> <S%H518><s%> a <S%H610>pot<s%> of <S%H8081>oil.<s%>

Then he <S%H559>said,<s%> <S%H1980>Go,<s%> <S%H7592>borrow<s%> thee <S%H3627>vessels<s%> <S%H4480>abroad<s%> <S%H2351><s%> <S%H4480>of<s%> <S%H854><s%> <S%H3605>all<s%> thy <S%H7934>neighbors,<s%> even <S%H7386>empty<s%> <S%H3627>vessels;<s%> borrow not a <S%H408>few.<s%> <S%H4591><s%>

And when thou art come <S%H935>in,<s%> thou shalt <S%H5462>shut<s%> the <S%H1817>door<s%> <S%H1157>upon<s%> thee and <S%H1157>upon<s%> thy <S%H1121>sons,<s%> and shalt pour <S%H3332>out<s%> <S%H5921>into<s%> <S%H3605>all<s%> <S%H428>those<s%> <S%H3627>vessels,<s%> and thou shalt set <S%H5265>aside<s%> that which is <S%H4392>full.<s%>

So she <S%H1980>went<s%> <S%H4480>from<s%> <S%H854><s%> him, and <S%H5462>shut<s%> the <S%H1817>door<s%> <S%H1157>upon<s%> her and <S%H1157>upon<s%> her <S%H1121>sons,<s%> <S%H1992>who<s%> <S%H5066>brought<s%> the vessels <S%H413>to<s%> her; and <S%H1931>she<s%> poured <S%H3332>out.<s%>

And it came to <S%H1961>pass,<s%> when the <S%H3627>vessels<s%> were <S%H4390>full,<s%> that she <S%H559>said<s%> <S%H413>unto<s%> her <S%H1121>son,<s%> <S%H5066>Bring<s%> <S%H413><s%> me <S%H5750>yet<s%> a <S%H3627>vessel.<s%> And he <S%H559>said<s%> <S%H413>unto<s%> her, There is <S%H369>not<s%> a <S%H3627>vessel<s%> <S%H5750>more.<s%> And the <S%H8081>oil<s%> <S%H5975>stayed.<s%>

Then she <S%H935>came<s%> and <S%H5046>told<s%> the <S%H376>man<s%> of <S%H430>God.<s%> And he <S%H559>said,<s%> <S%H1980>Go,<s%> <S%H4376>sell<s%> <S%H853><s%> the <S%H8081>oil,<s%> and <S%H7999>pay<s%> <S%H853><s%> thy <S%H5386>debt,<s%> and <S%H2421>live<s%> <S%H859>thou<s%> and thy <S%H1121>children<s%> of the <S%H3498>rest.<s%>

And it <S%H1961>fell<s%> on a <S%H3117>day,<s%> that <S%H477>Elisha<s%> <S%H5674>passed<s%> <S%H413>to<s%> <S%H7766>Shunem,<s%> <S%H8033>where<s%> was a <S%H1419>great<s%> <S%H802>woman;<s%> and she <S%H2388>constrained<s%> him to <S%H398>eat<s%> <S%H3899>bread.<s%> And so it <S%H1961>was,<s%> that as <S%H4480>oft<s%> <S%H1767><s%> as he passed <S%H5674>by,<s%> he turned <S%H5493>in<s%> <S%H8033>thither<s%> to <S%H398>eat<s%> <S%H3899>bread.<s%>

And she <S%H559>said<s%> <S%H413>unto<s%> her <S%H376>husband,<s%> <S%H2009>Behold<s%> <S%H4994>now,<s%> I <S%H3045>perceive<s%> <S%H3588>that<s%> <S%H1931>this<s%> is a <S%H6918>holy<s%> <S%H376>man<s%> of <S%H430>God,<s%> which passeth <S%H5674>by<s%> <S%H5921><s%> us <S%H8548>continually.<s%>

Let us <S%H6213>make<s%> a <S%H6996>little<s%> <S%H5944>chamber,<s%> I pray <S%H4994>thee,<s%> on the <S%H7023>wall;<s%> and let us <S%H7760>set<s%> for him <S%H8033>there<s%> a <S%H4296>bed,<s%> and a <S%H7979>table,<s%> and a <S%H3678>stool,<s%> and a <S%H4501>candlestick:<s%> and it shall <S%H1961>be,<s%> when he <S%H935>cometh<s%> <S%H413>to<s%> us, that he shall turn <S%H5493>in<s%> <S%H8033>thither.<s%>

And it <S%H1961>fell<s%> on a <S%H3117>day,<s%> that he <S%H935>came<s%> <S%H8033>thither,<s%> and he <S%H5493>turned<s%> <S%H413>into<s%> the <S%H5944>chamber,<s%> and <S%H7901>lay<s%> <S%H8033>there.<s%>

And he <S%H559>said<s%> <S%H413>to<s%> <S%H1522>Gehazi<s%> his <S%H5288>servant,<s%> <S%H7121>Call<s%> <S%H2063>this<s%> <S%H7767>Shunammite.<s%> And when he had <S%H7121>called<s%> her, she <S%H5975>stood<s%> <S%H6440>before<s%> him.

And he <S%H559>said<s%> unto him, <S%H559>Say<s%> <S%H4994>now<s%> <S%H413>unto<s%> her, <S%H2009>Behold,<s%> thou hast been <S%H2729>careful<s%> <S%H413>for<s%> us <S%H854>with<s%> <S%H3605>all<s%> <S%H2063>this<s%> <S%H2731>care;<s%> <S%H4100>what<s%> is to be <S%H6213>done<s%> for thee? <S%H3426>wouldest<s%> thou be <S%H1696>spoken<s%> for <S%H413>to<s%> the <S%H4428>king,<s%> <S%H176>or<s%> <S%H413>to<s%> the <S%H8269>captain<s%> of the <S%H6635>host?<s%> And she <S%H559>answered,<s%> <S%H595>I<s%> <S%H3427>dwell<s%> <S%H8432>among<s%> mine own <S%H5971>people.<s%>

And he <S%H559>said,<s%> <S%H4100>What<s%> then is to be <S%H6213>done<s%> for her? And <S%H1522>Gehazi<s%> <S%H559>answered,<s%> <S%H61>Verily<s%> she hath <S%H369>no<s%> <S%H1121>child,<s%> and her <S%H376>husband<s%> is <S%H2204>old.<s%>
And he <S%H559>said,<s%> <S%H7121>Call<s%> her. And when he had <S%H7121>called<s%> her, she <S%H5975>stood<s%> in the <S%H6607>door.<s%>

And he <S%H559>said,<s%> About <S%H2088>this<s%> <S%H4150>season,<s%> according to the <S%H6256>time<s%> of <S%H2416>life,<s%> <S%H859>thou<s%> shalt <S%H2263>embrace<s%> a <S%H1121>son.<s%> And she <S%H559>said,<s%> <S%H408>Nay,<s%> my <S%H113>lord,<s%> thou <S%H376>man<s%> of <S%H430>God,<s%> do not <S%H3576>lie<s%> <S%H408><s%> unto thine <S%H8198>handmaid.<s%>

And the <S%H802>woman<s%> <S%H2029>conceived,<s%> and <S%H3205>bore<s%> a <S%H1121>son<s%> at <S%H2088>that<s%> <S%H4150>season<s%> <S%H834>that<s%> <S%H477>Elisha<s%> had <S%H1696>said<s%> <S%H413>unto<s%> her, according to the <S%H6256>time<s%> of <S%H2416>life.<s%>

And when the <S%H3206>child<s%> was <S%H1431>grown,<s%> it <S%H1961>fell<s%> on a <S%H3117>day,<s%> that he went <S%H3318>out<s%> <S%H413>to<s%> his <S%H1>father<s%> <S%H413>to<s%> the <S%H7114>reapers.<s%>

And he <S%H559>said<s%> <S%H413>unto<s%> his <S%H1>father,<s%> My <S%H7218>head,<s%> my <S%H7218>head.<s%> And he <S%H559>said<s%> <S%H413>to<s%> a <S%H5288>lad,<s%> <S%H5375>Carry<s%> him <S%H413>to<s%> his <S%H517>mother.<s%>

And when he had <S%H5375>taken<s%> him, and <S%H935>brought<s%> him <S%H413>to<s%> his <S%H517>mother,<s%> he <S%H3427>sat<s%> <S%H5921>on<s%> her <S%H1290>knees<s%> <S%H5704>till<s%> <S%H6672>noon,<s%> and then <S%H4191>died.<s%>

And she went <S%H5927>up,<s%> and <S%H7901>laid<s%> him <S%H5921>on<s%> the <S%H4296>bed<s%> of the <S%H376>man<s%> of <S%H430>God,<s%> and <S%H5462>shut<s%> the door <S%H1157>upon<s%> him, and went <S%H3318>out.<s%>

And she <S%H7121>called<s%> <S%H413>unto<s%> her <S%H376>husband,<s%> and <S%H559>said,<s%> <S%H7971>Send<s%> me, I pray <S%H4994>thee,<s%> <S%H259>one<s%> <S%H4480>of<s%> the young <S%H5288>men,<s%> and <S%H259>one<s%> of the <S%H860>asses,<s%> that I may <S%H7323>run<s%> <S%H5704>to<s%> the <S%H376>man<s%> of <S%H430>God,<s%> and come <S%H7725>again.<s%>

And he <S%H559>said,<s%> <S%H4069>Wherefore<s%> wilt <S%H859>thou<s%> <S%H1980>go<s%> <S%H413>to<s%> him <S%H3117>today?<s%> it is <S%H3808>neither<s%> new <S%H2320>moon,<s%> <S%H3808>nor<s%> <S%H7676>sabbath.<s%> And she <S%H559>said,<s%> It shall be <S%H7965>well.<s%>

Then she <S%H2280>saddled<s%> an <S%H860>ass,<s%> and <S%H559>said<s%> <S%H413>to<s%> her <S%H5288>servant,<s%> <S%H5090>Drive,<s%> and go <S%H1980>forward;<s%> <S%H6113>slack<s%> <S%H408>not<s%> thy <S%H7392>riding<s%> for me, <S%H3588>except<s%> <S%H518><s%> I <S%H559>bid<s%> thee.

So she <S%H1980>went<s%> and <S%H935>came<s%> <S%H413>unto<s%> the <S%H376>man<s%> of <S%H430>God<s%> <S%H413>to<s%> <S%H2022>mount<s%> <S%H3760>Carmel.<s%> And it came to <S%H1961>pass,<s%> when the <S%H376>man<s%> of <S%H430>God<s%> <S%H7200>saw<s%> her afar <S%H4480>off,<s%> <S%H5048><s%> that he <S%H559>said<s%> <S%H413>to<s%> <S%H1522>Gehazi<s%> his <S%H5288>servant,<s%> <S%H2009>Behold,<s%> yonder is <S%H1975>that<s%> Shunammite: <S%H7767><s%>

Run <S%H7323><s%> <S%H6258>now,<s%> I pray <S%H4994>thee,<s%> to <S%H7122>meet<s%> her, and <S%H559>say<s%> unto her, Is it <S%H7965>well<s%> with thee? is it <S%H7965>well<s%> with thy <S%H376>husband?<s%> is it <S%H7965>well<s%> with the <S%H3206>child?<s%> And she <S%H559>answered,<s%> It is <S%H7965>well.<s%>

And when she <S%H935>came<s%> <S%H413>to<s%> the <S%H376>man<s%> of <S%H430>God<s%> <S%H413>to<s%> the <S%H2022>hill,<s%> she <S%H2388>caught<s%> him by the <S%H7272>feet:<s%> but <S%H1522>Gehazi<s%> came <S%H5066>near<s%> to thrust her <S%H1920>away.<s%> And the <S%H376>man<s%> of <S%H430>God<s%> <S%H559>said,<s%> Let her <S%H7503>alone;<s%> <S%H3588>for<s%> her <S%H5315>soul<s%> is <S%H4843>vexed<s%> within her: and the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> hath <S%H5956>hid<s%> it <S%H4480>from<s%> me, and hath <S%H3808>not<s%> <S%H5046>told<s%> me.

Then she <S%H559>said,<s%> Did I <S%H7592>desire<s%> a <S%H1121>son<s%> <S%H4480>of<s%> <S%H854><s%> my <S%H113>lord?<s%> did I <S%H3808>not<s%> <S%H559>say,<s%> Do <S%H3808>not<s%> <S%H7952>deceive<s%> me?

Then he <S%H559>said<s%> to <S%H1522>Gehazi,<s%> Gird <S%H2296>up<s%> thy <S%H4975>loins,<s%> and <S%H3947>take<s%> my <S%H4938>staff<s%> in thine <S%H3027>hand,<s%> and go thy <S%H1980>way:<s%> <S%H3588>if<s%> thou <S%H4672>meet<s%> any <S%H376>man,<s%> <S%H1288>salute<s%> him <S%H3808>not;<s%> and <S%H3588>if<s%> <S%H376>any<s%> <S%H1288>salute<s%> thee, <S%H6030>answer<s%> him <S%H3808>not<s%> again: and <S%H7760>lay<s%> my <S%H4938>staff<s%> <S%H5921>upon<s%> the <S%H6440>face<s%> of the <S%H5288>child.<s%>

And the <S%H517>mother<s%> of the <S%H5288>child<s%> <S%H559>said,<s%> As the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> <S%H2416>liveth,<s%> and as thy <S%H5315>soul<s%> <S%H2416>liveth,<s%> I will <S%H518>not<s%> <S%H5800>leave<s%> thee. And he <S%H6965>arose,<s%> and <S%H1980>followed<s%> <S%H310><s%> her.

And <S%H1522>Gehazi<s%> passed <S%H5674>on<s%> <S%H6440>before<s%> them, and <S%H7760>laid<s%> <S%H853><s%> the <S%H4938>staff<s%> <S%H5921>upon<s%> the <S%H6440>face<s%> of the <S%H5288>child;<s%> but there was <S%H369>neither<s%> <S%H6963>voice,<s%> <S%H369>nor<s%> <S%H7182>hearing.<s%> Wherefore he went <S%H7725>again<s%> to <S%H7122>meet<s%> him, and <S%H5046>told<s%> him, <S%H559>saying,<s%> The <S%H5288>child<s%> is <S%H3808>not<s%> <S%H6974>awaked.<s%>

And when <S%H477>Elisha<s%> was <S%H935>come<s%> into the <S%H1004>house,<s%> <S%H2009>behold,<s%> the <S%H5288>child<s%> was <S%H4191>dead,<s%> and <S%H7901>laid<s%> <S%H5921>upon<s%> his <S%H4296>bed.<s%>
He went <S%H935>in<s%> therefore, and <S%H5462>shut<s%> the <S%H1817>door<s%> <S%H1157>upon<s%> them <S%H8147>twain,<s%> and <S%H6419>prayed<s%> <S%H413>unto<s%> the <S%H3068>LORD.<s%>

And he went <S%H5927>up,<s%> and <S%H7901>lay<s%> <S%H5921>upon<s%> the <S%H3206>child,<s%> and <S%H7760>put<s%> his <S%H6310>mouth<s%> <S%H5921>upon<s%> his <S%H6310>mouth,<s%> and his <S%H5869>eyes<s%> <S%H5921>upon<s%> his <S%H5869>eyes,<s%> and his <S%H3709>hands<s%> <S%H5921>upon<s%> his <S%H3709>hands:<s%> and he <S%H1457>stretched<s%> himself <S%H5921>upon<s%> the child; and the <S%H1320>flesh<s%> of the <S%H3206>child<s%> waxed <S%H2552>warm.<s%>

Then he <S%H7725>returned,<s%> and <S%H1980>walked<s%> in the <S%H1004>house<s%> to and <S%H259>fro;<s%> <S%H2008><s%> <S%H259><s%> <S%H2008><s%> and went <S%H5927>up,<s%> and <S%H1457>stretched<s%> himself <S%H5921>upon<s%> him: and the <S%H5288>child<s%> <S%H2237>sneezed<s%> <S%H5704><s%> <S%H7651>seven<s%> <S%H6471>times,<s%> and the <S%H5288>child<s%> <S%H6491>opened<s%> <S%H853><s%> his <S%H5869>eyes.<s%>

And he <S%H7121>called<s%> <S%H413><s%> <S%H1522>Gehazi,<s%> and <S%H559>said,<s%> <S%H7121>Call<s%> <S%H413><s%> <S%H2063>this<s%> <S%H7767>Shunammite.<s%> So he <S%H7121>called<s%> her. And when she was <S%H935>come<s%> in <S%H413>unto<s%> him, he <S%H559>said,<s%> Take <S%H5375>up<s%> thy <S%H1121>son.<s%>

Then she went <S%H935>in,<s%> and <S%H5307>fell<s%> <S%H5921>at<s%> his <S%H7272>feet,<s%> and bowed <S%H7812>herself<s%> to the <S%H776>ground,<s%> and took <S%H5375>up<s%> <S%H853><s%> her <S%H1121>son,<s%> and went <S%H3318>out.<s%>

And <S%H477>Elisha<s%> came <S%H7725>again<s%> to <S%H1537>Gilgal:<s%> and there was a <S%H7458>dearth<s%> in the <S%H776>land;<s%> and the <S%H1121>sons<s%> of the <S%H5030>prophets<s%> were <S%H3427>sitting<s%> <S%H6440>before<s%> him: and he <S%H559>said<s%> unto his <S%H5288>servant,<s%> Set <S%H8239>on<s%> the <S%H1419>great<s%> <S%H5518>pot,<s%> and <S%H1310>seethe<s%> <S%H5138>pottage<s%> for the <S%H1121>sons<s%> of the <S%H5030>prophets.<s%>

And <S%H259>one<s%> went <S%H3318>out<s%> <S%H413>into<s%> the <S%H7704>field<s%> to <S%H3950>gather<s%> <S%H219>herbs,<s%> and <S%H4672>found<s%> a <S%H7704>wild<s%> <S%H1612>vine,<s%> and <S%H3950>gathered<s%> <S%H4480>thereof<s%> <S%H7704>wild<s%> <S%H6498>gourds<s%> his <S%H899>lap<s%> <S%H4393>full,<s%> and <S%H935>came<s%> and <S%H6398>shred<s%> them <S%H413>into<s%> the <S%H5518>pot<s%> of <S%H5138>pottage:<s%> <S%H3588>for<s%> they <S%H3045>knew<s%> them <S%H3808>not.<s%>

So they poured <S%H3332>out<s%> for the <S%H376>men<s%> to <S%H398>eat.<s%> And it came to <S%H1961>pass,<s%> as they were <S%H398>eating<s%> of the <S%H4480>pottage,<s%> <S%H5138><s%> that <S%H1992>they<s%> cried <S%H6817>out,<s%> and <S%H559>said,<s%> O thou <S%H376>man<s%> of <S%H430>God,<s%> there is <S%H4194>death<s%> in the <S%H5518>pot.<s%> And they <S%H3201>could<s%> <S%H3808>not<s%> <S%H398>eat<s%> thereof.
